alert.note: Alert for Coastal Levy; Inland Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Levy County through 700 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Fowlers Bluff to 17 miles south of Chiefland. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chiefland, Bronson, East Bronson, Fowlers Bluff, Andrews, Manattee Road, Fanning Springs, Otter Creek and Manatee Springs State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
